name: 家园/HOME
description: "Home" is a game that integrates survival, fighting, and leisure. You can play freely in this game world. You can stay at home, read books, order takeout, read books, and so on. You can also explore outside, Parkour, and even find monsters and challenge various boss.If you don't play, you'll regret it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7;Windows8;Windows10 Processor: i3 530 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB Storage: 1024 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7，Windows8,Windows10 Processor: i5 8400 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 2GB Storage: 512 MB available space
